short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance Google search with extra buttons to customize the time, filetype etc of your search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you need google search customization that allow you to search only for PDFs, PNGs etc, or search in certain sites, then this is for you. Also makes dorking easier.

The buttons appear just below google search and allow you to customize your search.

This tool is useful for students, who may need to find research papers.
